mapper.select: SELECT MRI.MR_NUM, MRI.MD_NUM, MRI.TA_HOME_NUM, MRI.TA_AWAY_NUM, MRI.MR_HOME_SCORE, MRI.MR_AWAY_SCORE, MRI.MR_HOME_MANNER_POINT, MRI.MR_AWAY_MANNER_POINT, MRI.MR_REQUEST_STATUS, MD.MD_DATE, MD.MD_ADDRESS, TA.TA_NAME FROM MATCH_RESULT_INFO MRI INNER JOIN MATCH_DEAL_INFO MD ON MRI.MD_NUM = MD.MD_NUM INNER JOIN TEAM_INFO TA ON TA.TA_NUM = MRI.TA_AWAY_NUM WHERE TA_HOME_NUM = #{taHomeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_RESULT (MD_NUM, TA_HOME_NUM, TA_AWAY_NUM, MR_REQUEST_STATUS) VALUES (#{mdNum}, #{taHomeNum}, #{taAwayNum}, #{mrRequestStatus})
